text: Awesome thank you so much, guess I should mention about about me as well, I'm a final year student at the university of Hertfordshire, I got lucky enough to work at company called freefolk as a 3d generalist for a little bit, I'm currently working on my final year film called The Lodge with a group of people as the texture/lookdev artist as well as the generalist for some of the odd-jobs that we don't have people for like ground interaction and some enviroment work
No worries about the burst replies, I get that's it's probably super busy for you, and in any case thanks so much for taking the time to give some crit every now and again
